mapper.insert: INSERT INTO festa_reply(frno, contentid, frcontent, id, nickname) VALUES(seq_frno.nextval, #{contentid}, #{frcontent}, #{id}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT frno, contentid, id, nickname, frcontent, frregist, fredit, profileimg FROM (SELECT rownum rn, f.frno, f.contentid, f.id, f.nickname, f.frcontent, f.frregist, f.fredit, m.profileimg FROM festa_reply f, member m WHERE contentid = #{contentid} AND f.id = m.id AND frno > 0 AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
